nodes.documentation:
@dev The Pregnant event is fired when two beast successfully breed and the pregnancy
  timer begins for the matron.
nodes.name: Pregnant

nodes.documentation:
@dev Update the address of the genetic contract, can only be called by the CEO.
 @param _address An address of a GeneMagic contract instance to be used from this point forward.
nodes.name: setGeneMagicAddress
_isReadyToBreed
_isSiringPermitted
_triggerCooldown
approveSiring
setAutoBirthFee

nodes.documentation:
@dev Checks to see if a given Beast is pregnant and (if so) if the gestation
  period has passed.
nodes.name: _isReadyToGiveBirth

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct BeastBase.Beast storage ref[] storage ref

nodes.name: isReadyToBreed

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct BeastBase.Beast storage ref[] storage ref

nodes.documentation:
@dev Checks whether a beast is currently pregnant.
 @param _beastId reference the id of the beast, any user can inquire about it
nodes.name: isPregnant
_isValidMatingPair

struct BeastBase.Beast storage ref[] storage ref
function (struct BeastBase.Beast storage pointer,uint256,struct BeastBase.Beast storage pointer,uint256) view returns (bool)

  breeding via auction (i.e. skips ownership and siring approval checks).
